name: Fnf Tricky: scary music game
description:
Have you ever dreamed about a clown since you were a kid? And, Do you do love zombies too? This will be the best mod you’ve played in your life. A special game is just for Tricky fans who love Madness Combat.
If you are an FNF fan, pls, try this fantastic game now!
How to play? So easy! Just tap the color arrow when they exact match, don’t match transparent arow. Feel the music and rock the beat Dance with cg5 and Funkin rhythm!
Enjoy it! And, Have fun!
